graphic.name: Project Utilization
graphic.hql: select UtilizationDashboardView.DownloadCounter, UtilizationDashboardView.Name from Compelligence.Domain.Entity.Views.UtilizationDashboardView UtilizationDashboardView where UtilizationDashboardView.ClientCompany = '$S{ClientCompany}' And (UtilizationDashboardView.AssignedTo = '$P{UserId}' Or UtilizationDashboardView.CreatedBy = '$P{UserId}' ) And UtilizationDashboardView.Status = '3000' )

graphic.name: Project Rating
graphic.hql: select ProjectRatingView.Rating , ProjectRatingView.Name from Compelligence.Domain.Entity.Views.ProjectRatingView ProjectRatingView where ProjectRatingView.ClientCompany = '$S{ClientCompany}' And ProjectRatingView.Status = '3000' And (ProjectRatingView.AssignedTo = '$P{UserId}' Or ProjectRatingView.CreatedBy = '$P{UserId}' )
